an outdoor CCTV surveillance system for water discharge . the system was installed in the u.s. in the 1970s .
contractors of construction sites are required to provide CCTV at their discharge outlet at the public drain to monitor their storm water run-off discharge .
question: Design a two-stage computer vision solution to meet the following requirements . if you have a problem with a computer vision system, you can create a 2-stage solution .
in the first stage, identify water discharge events from CCTV snapshots . identifie water discharge incidents from the CCTV snapshot .
once a discharge event is identified, determine whether the discharged water is clean or dirty . in the second stage, determine if the water is cleaned or dirty.
use a flow chart to present your proposed two-stage solution . use the flow chart below to show your proposed solution.
